game.title: The Treasure Hunt
game.description: In this quest, you will embark on an epic adventure to find the long-lost treasure of the ancient kings. Explore treacherous dungeons, solve mind-bending puzzles, and overcome formidable challenges to claim your reward.
game.reward: 10000 gold coins, a legendary artifact, and eternal glory

task.description: Your first task is to find the elusive old sage who possesses the knowledge of the hidden location of the ancient map. Seek him out in the enchanted forest, where he resides in a hidden cottage.

task.objective: Retrieve the key to the labyrinth
task.description: With the ancient map in your possession, you must journey to the treacherous labyrinth. Battle fierce creatures, solve riddles, and navigate through its winding corridors to find the key that will unlock the next step of your journey.
The final challenge awaits you in the dragon's lair. Face the mighty dragon and retrieve the legendary treasure. Be prepared for a battle that will test your skills, courage, and wit.
